attributes.title: Mega Man Battle Royale BLOOPERS!
attributes.caption: Join Wiz & Boomstick for funny outtakes and bloopers from DEATH BATTLE!
attributes.description: Join Wiz & Boomstick for funny outtakes and bloopers from DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Black Widow VS Widowmaker Bloopers!
attributes.caption: They are funny, they are punny, they are a little looney, it's the bloopers of Black Widow VS Widowmaker DEATH BATTLE!
attributes.description: They are funny, they are punny, they are a little looney, it's the bloopers of Black Widow VS Widowmaker DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Captain Marvel VS Shazam BLOOPERS!

attributes.description: Boomstick has never snorted before??? It's Captain Marvel and Shazam Bloopers!

attributes.title: Wario VS King Dedede BLOOPERS!
attributes.caption: Wiz bathes only once a week?! It's the bloopers and outtakes from our Wario VS King Dedede DEATH BATTLE!
attributes.description: Wiz bathes only once a week?! It's the bloopers and outtakes from our Wario VS King Dedede DEATH BATTLE!

attributes.title: Ben 10 VS Green Lantern BLOOPERS!
attributes.caption: He is no ordinary kid, he is Ben 1,000,912! That, doesn't really sound right... Check out Ben 10 Vs Green Lantern's BLOOPERS!
